SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: MATERIALS_READ_TO_TRANSFER
SQLDataSource.Where:
wo_no IN (SELECT wo_no FROM (SELECT t2.wo_no, t2.task_seq, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(t2.wo_no) as reg_date, &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(t2.task_seq) as contract_id, &AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(t2.task_seq)) as main_rep FROM &AO.jt_task_uiv_cfv t2 WHERE t2.task_seq IN (SELECT t2.task_seq FROM &AO.jt_execution_instance_uiv t2 WHERE t2.state = 'Assigned' AND t2.sent_date IS NULL) AND t2.task_seq IN (SELECT task_seq FROM &AO.transport_task_line ttl, &AO.maint_material_req_line_uiv mt WHERE ttl.order_ref3 = mt.maint_material_order_no AND ttl.order_ref2 = mt.task_seq AND (&AO.Transport_Task_API.Has_Line_In_Status_Picked(ttl.transport_task_id) = 'TRUE' OR &AO.Transport_Task_API.Has_Line_In_Status_Executed(ttl.transport_task_id) = 'TRUE'))) WHERE &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(task_seq)) = 'MS' AND reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm') AND REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%')
AND REPLACE(NVL(main_rep, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
